summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 15465 entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Charles Street, from its intersections at Seattle Boulevard to Eighth Avenue South; Eighth Avenue South, from Charles Street to Addition Street; thence, crossing Seattle Boulevard, from Addition Street to Atlantic Street; thence along Eighth Avenue South, from Atlantic Street to an intersection with the existing roadway at Eighth Avenue South and Lyon Street, by constructing a plank roadway thereon thirty (30) feet in width, and wooden walks six (6) feet in width along one side thereof, all in accordance with Resolution No. 445 of the of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899."
